alert.note: Alert for Northwest Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 2:41AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Windham, western Norfolk, southeastern Worcester, south central Middlesex, northwestern Bristol and northern Providence Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 241 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Uxbridge to near Foster. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Woonsocket, Cumberland, Natick, Franklin, Needham, North Attleborough, Milford, Attleboro, Walpole, Smithfield, Lincoln, Killingly, Bellingham, Burrillville, Northbridge, Holliston, Uxbridge, Medway, Medfield and North Smithfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
